input.sentences: [female] loved her city . from the orange sherbet colored building to the regal palm trees .
she lived in an elegant apartment building .
she had an easy walk to view the river .
going to the open market was invigorating and fun .
she always enjoyed a pasta and bean dish while at the market . it was a perfect end to a shopping spree .
